body:
#Kaldi is a toolkit for speech recognition written in C++ and licensed under the Apache License v2.0. Kaldi is intended for use by speech recognition researchers. It has quite a number of dependency packages. This PR hosts a board for watching progress on building Kaldi.

The following list may keep increasing as I build kaldi.

- [x] sctk (#3325 merged)
- [x] openfst (#3324 merged)
- [x] sph2pipe
- [x] speedx
- [x] kaldi CPU version
- [x] kaldi GPU verison

- [x] Add `# Does not use Aututools` to kaldi
- [x] Refine the BLAS configuration (check `petsc` and `trillioins`) 
- [x] Substitute `find` with `os.walk()`.
- [x] Substitute `rsync` with `os.walk()`.
- [x] Patch `sph2pipe` with a CMake file.
title: Add package kaldi.
